title: Which One Should I Choose?
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>All the cakes look so delicious, I can’t choose~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You two can choose first.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What’s with the attitude? You’re younger than us. Go pick yours.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m okay with anything, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Geez, what are you trying to hold back for....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m not holding back. Aren’t you the one that’s holding back, Nico-chan? It’s fine, you can pick first.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Nico will pick after you, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Then maybe I’ll just go ahead and choose first♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Sure.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Sure.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh, are you sure....? Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What’s with that face? You’re the one who asked....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You probably always say that to get other people to choose first, right? It’s just something the oldest sibling always does. Take what you want. No need to hold back today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I-, I don’t know what to do if you say that~! I really like everything, so I can’t choose. You two should pick first~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
